page.title: 04Holy Family Church, 1977
page.content: The rectangular church built by Lanner Richwood is divided into two,to form a 250 seat church, and a social area for 200 people. 0ne of the main features is a gallery with an organ; the gallery can be used by the choir for church purposes, or as a social area overlooking the ballroom. Kitchen and bar facilities are available in the social area. In 1985 the parish of Holy Family, Sale Moor, covers an area of approximately 1 mile square and is situated to the south of Manchester and in the centre of the area grid reference 03800390. Apart from Sale Golf course and a small shopping centre, containing 74 shops,most of the area is used for housing.
